name: Don't Worry for Being Alone 7th (DWfBA 7th)
description:
The seventh photo in a series entitled "Don't Worry About Being Alone". 

It is a visualization of the work of an alternative band from Bandung, The Milo. When I took this photo at Performance Art, Gudang Sarinah, I could feel the sense of silence through the song

I put a part of the lyric so that we could feel what loneliness is. Enjoy :) 

“Lights guide you through the emptiness
There's something you could found
In the dark”
